name: Infinity Breaker
description:
Infinity Breaker

is the next generation of the classic

brick breaker + action game in VR

adapted to Virtual Reality!
In this game, immersed in a geometrical cosmic atmosphere, defend your hometown against mysterious space invaders that will turn everything they touch into ferocious opponents.

To battle and overcome what your opponent will throw at you, use your weapons to slash through the enemy bullets that you can't dodge, and return their fire by sending your power orbs straight to their blocks!

In this highly re-playable game; improve your score on every run by optimizing your unlocked skills and use of different weapons, and aiming to the weak points of enemy monsters.
